Cuyahoga County Helpline for COVID-19/Coronavirus

Cuyahoga County established a helpline for residents who have general questions about Coronavirus. This helpline is in addition to the Ohio Department of Health's call center.

div.h1: From the Desk of Principal Rybak...

img.alt: Katherine Rybak, Principal
img.title: Katherine Rybak, Principal

div.p: Hello and welcome to Constellation Schools: Eastside Arts Academy (EAA)! We, here at EAA, are working hard every day to give our students a top of the line education. We use the latest and proven evidence-based instructional strategies. We take a proactive approach to education with our Response to Intervention (RTI) framework that identifies any student that is not on track with the National Standards. Each student takes the NWEA MAP assessment to determine their educational needs. After identifying, we then provide research based interventions in a small group setting to ensure each child is growing and thriving.

Our art and music program is the foundation of our school. Each student is afforded the rare opportunity to receive art and music daily, all school year long. Students are encouraged to be artistically expressive and our teachers do everything they can to foster their creativity. Students of all grades are taught piano one day a week in our keyboarding/piano classroom. We encourage art and music exploration at every grade level. Students learn about a new artist or musician every day through our rotating Artist Spotlight. Additionally, students have the opportunity to join band, art club, and guitar club.

EAA has superior technology. Each student in grades 2-6 receives a laptop as part of our 1:1 laptop program. Each classroom is fully equipped with a SMART Board to create a hands on, tech savvy learning environment. Title I and Special Education classrooms are equipped with TouchSmart computers for specialized instruction. Students begin typing skills in kindergarten and are creating PowerPoint presentations by the end of 2nd grade.

I thank you for considering Constellation Schools: Eastside Arts Academy when selecting a school for your most precious gift....your child! We know how important your children are and we do all that we can to educate them in a creative, artistic, and nurturing environment where the sky is the limit! We are building tomorrow's future. Our teachers and faculty work to ensure your child is prepared for the world of tomorrow.

p.br: SaferOH tip line will allow students and adults to anonymously share information with school officials and law enforcement about threats to student safety - whether that involved threatened mass incident or harm of a single student.

div.p: Constellation Schools: Eastside Arts Academy does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination policies:
